permafrost.tundra.server.invoke

Class PackageInstallProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.invoke.AbstractInvokeChainProcessor
      • permafrost.tundra.server.invoke.PackageInstallProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.wm.app.b2b.server.invoke.InvokeChainProcessor, Startable

    public class PackageInstallProcessor
extends AbstractInvokeChainProcessor
    Runs any install services found in a package after it is installed, and any uninstall services found in a package prior to it being uninstalled.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  PackageInstallProcessor.Holder
      Initialization on demand holder idiom.

      A regular expression pattern used to detect package install services.
      static java.lang.String INTEGRATION_SERVER_PACKAGE_INSTALL_SERVICE
      The service used to install packages, which after invocation is when any detected package install services are invoked by this processor.

      • process

        public void process(java.util.Iterator iterator,
                    com.wm.app.b2b.server.BaseService baseService,
                    com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                    com.wm.app.b2b.server.invoke.ServiceStatus serviceStatus)
             throws com.wm.util.ServerException
        Process the invocation chain: if invocation is a package install, run package install services afterwards; if the invocation is a package uninstall, run package uninstall services before.
        Specified by:
        process in interface com.wm.app.b2b.server.invoke.InvokeChainProcessor
        Overrides:
        process in class AbstractInvokeChainProcessor
        Parameters:
        iterator - Invocation chain.
        baseService - The invoked service.
        pipeline - The input pipeline for the service.
        serviceStatus - The status of the service invocation.
        Throws:
        com.wm.util.ServerException - If the service invocation fails.
